about_the_game:
You will have to explore the devastated world after a global catastrophe in search of various items.
In this 3D arcade in genre "find and click" you need to flying across the map, you will be searching for different objects.
You will need to be vigilant and attentive, as the world of the apocalypse hides many dangers and hidden treasures.
Each found item will help you emerge victorious from this struggle for survival.

FEATURES:
-Unique setting: the game takes place in a post-apocalyptic world, creating an atmosphere of mystery and danger.
-Variety of items: players will have to search for numerous different objects on the map.
-See the world from above.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB) or higher
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
